fields.Title: INVENTORY / INFRA-MATERIALISM GUIDE
fields.Description: An Introduction to the Theories of Ignus Nilsen (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

fields.Title: START
input
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_interfacing_hands"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_interfacing_hands"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_interfacing_hands"])
Electrochemistry: "Sexual euphoria... increased sensit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sexual euphoria... increased sensitivity to stimulation... if you didn't know better, you'd say this plasm stuff sounds a lot like being on amphetamines.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Of course you want to go deeper. Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course you want to go deeper. What else are you here for?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "You breeze through the next several..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You breeze through the next several sections until you arrive at the final chapter, titled 'A Communism Above Reality'...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It concerns an interesting series o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It concerns an interesting series of events that took place during the invasion of Revachol. As Coalition forces made landfall, a cadre of Nilsen's most fervent acolytes *attempted to compress a Coalition aerostatic* with their collective will...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "In some of his later writings, Nils..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In some of his later writings, Nilsen himself speculated about the potential for an *extra-physical architecture* that disregards the laws of 'bourgeois physics' and instead relies on the revolutionary faith of the people for structural integrity.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "But one subject he returned to time..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But one subject he returned to time and time again was the fundamental relationship between thoughts and matter...

fields.Title: You: "That's... probably not what happene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's... probably not what happened.

fields.Title: MAIN HUB
Half Light: "He is your brother, a fellow *doom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is your brother, a fellow *doom prophet*.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Wrong! At least according to Ignus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wrong! At least according to Ignus Nilsen...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "There is no evidence that the human..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no evidence that the human digestive system is the seat of cognition. But let's get back to Ignus Nilsen, shall we?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "This sounds more like a question fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounds more like a question for a psychiatrist. (See also: 'A Brief Look at Psychiatry'.) But let's stick with Ignus Nilsen a moment...

fields.Title: You: "Stroke your beard proudly."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stroke your beard proudly.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Oh yeah, we're talking about white-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah, we're talking about white-hot *communist sex*, baby.

fields.Title: Logic: "Meaning it's hardly a theory at all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Meaning it's hardly a theory at all.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Nilsen called it "the highest expre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nilsen called it "the highest expression of Communist principles, a society whose literal foundation is the faith of its people".

fields.Title: You: "This might be too much, even for me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This might be too much, even for me.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "You turn to the table of contents...."
fields.Dialogue Text: You turn to the table of contents. The guide itself is divided into several sections with seemingly esoteric titles like 'Effects of Plasm on Root Vegetables' and 'Mental Projection and Transference'. There's also a brief introduction about the life of Ignus Nilsen.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Please, just stick with it. Otherwi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please, just stick with it. Otherwise, may we recommend 'A Brief Look at Words and Concepts'?

fields.Title: You: "Alright, let's hear about this extr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, let's hear about this extra-physical stuff!

fields.Title: Logic: "Who's to say the farmers aren't jus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who's to say the farmers aren't just cooking the books? Sounds like obvious SRV propaganda.

Variable["reputation.kim"] >= 5
Variable["reputation.kim"] >= 5

Kim Kitsuragi: ""That happened exactly once, and on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That happened exactly once, and only under extreme duress."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did I? My bad, detective. Won't ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I? My bad, detective. Won't happen again." He doesn't look up from his notebook.

fields.Title: Variable["character.habit_pyrholidon"]
Variable["character.habit_pyrholidon"]
!(Variable["character.habit_pyrholidon"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's been said, though, that in the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's been said, though, that in the weeks following the battle, the captain of the Debutante noted an increase in incidents of crewmen striking their heads on unexpectedly low bulkheads.

fields.Title: You: "That... seems like a bad theory to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That... seems like a bad theory to design buildings based on.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Another depicts a leaning tower wra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another depicts a leaning tower wrapped in a dramatic helix. The caption beneath it reads: 'The Tower of History'.

Variable["inventory.basic_guide_hub_reached"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_hub_reached"])
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_colours"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_colours"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_colours"])
You: ""... sandwiches.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... sandwiches."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant remains engrossed in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant remains engrossed in his notebook.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Of course, one doesn't need to be a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, one doesn't need to be a communist to be attuned to the thoughts of your brothers and sisters.

fields.Title: more plasm hub
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "There are numerous stories from Sam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There are numerous stories from Samara involving bandits or fascist mercenaries being levitated by farmers from the most ideologically advanced communes. Of course, few of these incidents have ever been rigorously investigated or substantiated...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Of course, colourful anecdotes only..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, colourful anecdotes only scratch the surface of what infra-materialists believe may be possible in a truly *third-level* society...

fields.Title: Jump to: [A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Of course, colourful anecdotes only..."]
Half Light: "Picture the lot of them, all standi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Picture the lot of them, all standing with their fingers in the air one minute, the next reduced to a bloody mist!

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: ""This Brief Look(TM) introduces rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This Brief Look(TM) introduces readers to one of this century's most fascinating and misunderstood theories in a concise, jargon-free manner."

fields.Title: You: "I always thought I *swam* through t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I always thought I *swam* through them.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's common for some developmentall..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's common for some developmentally delayed children to confuse sites of sensory input with the site of cognition. But let's get back to Ignus Nilsen, shall we?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's also been postulated that plas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's also been postulated that plasm may account for the remarkably full and manly facial hair observed on many communist males.

fields.Title: You: "Stroke it, but modestly."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stroke it, but modestly.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Hyper-productive vegetables and ult..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hyper-productive vegetables and ultra-horny communards are fine, but this theory hasn't quite gotten strange enough for you.

fields.Title: Jump to: [mental projection]
Jump to: [MAIN HUB]
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "More like suggestions, according to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More like suggestions, according to some of the SRV's leading infra-materialists.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "A true man of ideas, equal to any o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A true man of ideas, equal to any of the great Dolorian polymaths.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No, no. These are *terrible* colour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no. These are *terrible* colours. They're like... like...

fields.Title: You: "Start reading the first chapter."
fields.Dialogue Text: Start reading the first chapter.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "As Mazov's devoted comrade and lead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As Mazov's devoted comrade and leading theoretician, Nilsen was responsible for developing much of the intellectual foundation of communism. But his interests and speculations were famously wide-ranging.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Stay with us a moment longer. What'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stay with us a moment longer. What's more, Nilsen speculated that this plasm, when it becomes powerful enough, might begin to *influence* the material reality surrounding it. Hence the name: *infra-materialism*.

fields.Title: You: "So these people are saying that if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So these people are saying that if enough people just *believe* in communism, it will... come true?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I would say we share a perfectly a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I would say we share a perfectly average connection for two law officials working a case."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Your words hang in the air as the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your words hang in the air as the lieutenant scribbles something in his notebook. At some point he realizes you're waiting for him and looks up with a tightly knit brow.

fields.Title: Logic: "There you have it. A perfectly unfa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There you have it. A perfectly unfalsifiable loop. The theory is impossible to disprove on its own grounds...

fields.Title: Authority: "At last, a book gives you the respe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: At last, a book gives you the respect and validation you're entitled to.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, are there non-human sources o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, are there non-human sources of plasm?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "But as of this writing only human b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But as of this writing only human beings have demonstrated the intellectual capacity for revolutionary communism.

fields.Title: You: "Should've used their finger pistols..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Should've used their finger pistols instead. (Aim your finger pistols toward the bay.)

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "On the following page you come acro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the following page you come across a few black-and-white reproductions from Nilsen's own notebooks. One sketch depicts a government ministry shaped like a great inverted pyramid, a hectare in width at the top, balanced atop foundations the size of common apartments...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: ""A state that has lost the faith of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A state that has lost the faith of its people has forfeited the right to exist."

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "If you'd like to read further, may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you'd like to read further, may we recommend 'A Brief Look at Occidental Architecture'?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "If you'd like to try something diff..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you'd like to try something different, may we recommend 'A Brief Look at Graadian Literature'?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "One of the minor tragedies of the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of the minor tragedies of the late Revolutionary period is that few reliable accounts survive.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Some have theorised that such a soc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some have theorised that such a society would be fundamentally unrecognisable, lacking many of the institutions we typically take for granted in advanced societies, including organised governments, financial institutions, and law enforcement.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "In other words, this guide is the o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In other words, this guide is the only source you're likely to find.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Known to his numerous admirers as t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Known to his numerous admirers as the 'Evangelist of the Revolution' and to his even-more-numerous enemies as the 'Apocalyptic Shrike', Ignus Nilsen remains one of the most controversial and fascinating figures to emerge in the years of the Antecentennial Revolution, second only to Kras Mazov himself.

fields.Title: IsTHCPresent("apocalypse_cop")
IsTHCPresent("apocalypse_cop")
!(IsTHCPresent("apocalypse_cop"))
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "And yet, his most *fascinating* con..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And yet, his most *fascinating* contribution to history may be the most overlooked: His theory of ideological plasm, from which his followers and successors developed the school of communism known as *infra-materialism*.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No-no-no. There's *something* here,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No-no-no. There's *something* here, you can feel it!

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "At the lowest, or *first level*, re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: At the lowest, or *first level*, revolutionary plasm is believed to stimulate or invigorate matter without altering its essential properties.

fields.Title: You: "This sounds like that business with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounds like that business with the turnips...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Your hand feels clammy against your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your hand feels clammy against your bare chin. You wipe it along the back of the book and keep reading...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "That's correct! Reports from the Re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's correct! Reports from the Revolutionary period claim that the most radically devoted communards were able to engage in vigorous intercourse for up to *eight hours* at a time.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My apologies, I thought leaving yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My apologies, I thought leaving your partner hanging was simply the style at the 41st."

fields.Title: You: "Meaning the buildings stay up becau..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Meaning the buildings stay up because people *believe* they'll stay up?

fields.Title: Authority: "This sounds like a seditious fantas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This sounds like a seditious fantasy! How can they allow books like this in print?

fields.Title: Jump to: [A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The book fits quite snugly into you..."]
Conceptualization: "What an interesting colour palette...."
fields.Dialogue Text: What an interesting colour palette. It's vibrant, yet somehow leaves you ever so slightly nauseated.

fields.Title: You: "This feels like kid stuff. Is there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This feels like kid stuff. Is there no Slightly Longer Glance(TM) series?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "That's not right at all. Thoughts d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not right at all. Thoughts don't exist in the brain, they float through the *air*! Your brain is but a fish swimming through them...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Maybe if you're some kind of binocl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe if you're some kind of binoclard. *You* on the other hand, are a gut-thinker, through and through.

fields.Title: You: "Honestly, I have no idea where some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honestly, I have no idea where some of these thoughts come from.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Unfortunately, Nilsen passed away b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Unfortunately, Nilsen passed away before he was able to develop these initial ideas into a full-fledged theory. *That* work was left to subsequent generations of communist theorists...

fields.Title: You: "I'll just give it a few more pages...."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'll just give it a few more pages...

fields.Title: You: "Stroke your bare chin."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stroke your bare chin.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Eight hours, huh? Seems doable. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eight hours, huh? Seems doable. Your machinery could go the distance if called upon...

fields.Title: mental projection
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's become something of a folk leg..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's become something of a folk legend that during their final meeting, Nilsen and Mazov didn't speak a single word, preferring to sit in silence with their chamomile tea, reading one another's thoughts.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The communards were notoriously und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The communards were notoriously under-equipped against the much better-funded Coalition. In any event, it's doubtful even ceramic armour would have altered the outcome.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Yes, you have a little cabinet for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, you have a little cabinet for organizing and storing them away.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "During his final years in exile, he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: During his final years in exile, he produced, among other things, an early guide to homebrewing, instructions for raising revolutionary children, plans for a universal pictographic language, and a detailed materialist critique of Dolores Dei's chess strategy.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Building on Nilsen's basic insight,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Building on Nilsen's basic insight, these theorists reached a startling conclusion: that a sufficiently revolutionary state might begin to exhibit certain *extra-physical* effects based on the amount of plasm generated by its citizens.

fields.Title: You: "I'm completely lost."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm completely lost.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Even today, in parts of the SRV the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even today, in parts of the SRV there are collective farms whose root vegetable yields exceed those thought possible by capitalist agronomists.

fields.Title: You: ""... cigarettes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... cigarettes."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Why are you getting hung up on mech..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why are you getting hung up on mechanisms... Open your mind's aperture just a little wider! You're so close to true understanding!

fields.Title: You: "That's because *I'm* the law. The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's because *I'm* the law. The law-jaw.

fields.Title: You: ""Cease to be laws..." What do they..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cease to be laws..." What do they become then?

fields.Title: You: "What would a third-level society ev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What would a third-level society even look like? (Conclude.)

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "According to communard lore, these..."
fields.Dialogue Text: According to communard lore, these acolytes positioned themselves at the top of a redoubt just over the Bay of Revachol. From that vantage, they proceeded to visualise *pinching* Coalition Warship Debutante between their fingers, a gesture believed to assist in the extra-physical materialisation of their thoughts.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's a matter of fierce debate what..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a matter of fierce debate what form society would assume under the highest levels of revolutionary plasm, also known as 'Full Communism' or, as Nilsen termed it, 'Communism Above Reality'.

fields.Title: You: "That's... strangely beautiful."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's... strangely beautiful.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Among known attempts to channel thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Among known attempts to channel third-level capabilities, the most well-documented is the curious case of Coalition Warship Debutante.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The form of these stories also reca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The form of these stories also recalls several well-known Samaran folktales, in particular the one commonly known as 'Clever Oleg and the Flying Magistrate'.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The back of the book contains four..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The back of the book contains four or five pages of primary and secondary sources, but you'd need access to a university library to find most of them.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: ""We may yet discover," he wrote in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We may yet discover," he wrote in his notebooks, "that under certain, exceptional circumstances, the proletariat's embrace of historical materialism may be *so fervent* that their beliefs take form in the world of matter as a kind of revolutionary 'plasm'."

fields.Title: You: "Don't, it's embarrassing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't, it's embarrassing.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Eight hours? There's no way. Your e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eight hours? There's no way. Your equipment would be mashed to jelly.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Most infra-materialists would argue..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most infra-materialists would argue that the inability of skeptics to detect plasm is simply evidence of their own insufficient revolutionary enthusiasm.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Under suitably revolutionary condit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Under suitably revolutionary conditions, you might be! Though infra-materialists would argue that it's more like the community is *collectively* the law.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Correct. Though certain particulars..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Correct. Though certain particulars of the theory are commonly attributed to Nilsen himself, the *evidentiary* basis of those attributions has always been a point of contention between infra-materialists and their critics.

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_idiocy"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_idiocy"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_idiocy"])
Logic: "There's probably something wrong wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's probably something wrong with this theory, but you're the kind of person who believes anything they read in a book, so why don't you just roll with it?

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, Kim. You'd say that we share..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, Kim. You'd say that we share a pretty special connection, right?"

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.sandwich_kim_ate"]
Variable["inventory.sandwich_kim_ate"]
!(Variable["inventory.sandwich_kim_ate"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "That's alright, because you've reac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's alright, because you've reached the end of the book.

fields.Title: Half Light: "D-d-did that book just say there's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: D-d-did that book just say there's no place for you in this future?

fields.Title: You: "Uh, right?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Uh, right?

fields.Title: You: "How exactly does the plasm 'stimula..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How exactly does the plasm 'stimulate' matter?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The difference in these yields was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The difference in these yields was simply too great to be accounted for by mere climate or soil conditions. The only reasonable explanation, infra-materialists argue, is the high level of revolutionary plasm emanating from the commune itself.

fields.Title: Variable["character.beard_shaven"]
Variable["character.beard_shaven"]
!(Variable["character.beard_shaven"])
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_endurance_loverboy"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_endurance_loverboy"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_endurance_loverboy"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Precisely, though plasm does more t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Precisely, though plasm does more than increase vegetable yields. It may also influence the *physiology* of revolutionaries themselves.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "When a community has achieved a suf..."
fields.Dialogue Text: When a community has achieved a sufficiently high degree of revolutionary fervour, infra-materialists believe that second-level effects may be observed.

fields.Title: You: ""That's exactly what I mean. It's p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's exactly what I mean. It's probably why we're always finishing each other's..."

fields.Title: You: "Wait, if there's no evidence plasm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, if there's no evidence plasm exists, how can the theory be true?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Some infra-materialists have even a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Some infra-materialists have even argued that it might require more plasm than *humanity alone* may be capable of producing.

fields.Title: Jump to: [more plasm hub]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_aperture"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_aperture"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_aperture"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Others have argued that people livi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Others have argued that people living under third-level conditions will be immune to such infirmities as hunger, disease, and mental illness...

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "In fact, many of infra-materialism'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In fact, many of infra-materialism's critics both inside and outside the communist movement have said the same thing.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "At this second level, certain hyper..."
fields.Dialogue Text: At this second level, certain hyper-revolutionary individuals may even develop the ability to extend their thoughts into material space and vice versa.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suppose we do work quite well to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suppose we do work quite well together."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have never shared a sandwich, d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We have never shared a sandwich, detective. Despite your heroic efforts, I might add."

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "As we were saying, it's generally b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As we were saying, it's generally believed that these effects are only exhibited by certain *hyper-revolutionary* individuals, generally less than .01% of the revolutionary population...

fields.Title: Authority: "SAY IT. You know you want to."
fields.Dialogue Text: SAY IT. You know you want to.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The acolytes (along with the redoub..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The acolytes (along with the redoubt) were vapourised in an artillery strike before the process could be completed...

fields.Title: You: "Wait, but what if the people stop b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, but what if the people stop believing and the buildings collapse?

fields.Title: Jump to: [MAIN HUB]
You: "Nah, I always listen to my gut."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nah, I always listen to my gut.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Certainly. In essence, Nilsen is ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Certainly. In essence, Nilsen is arguing that thoughts don’t just reside *inside* the brain, they radiate outward *from* it. According to this idea, the brain is an ideological transponder, constantly emitting waves of highly politicised energy, which Nilsen called 'plasm'.

fields.Title: You: "Whoa."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoa.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "To take one example: During the Rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To take one example: During the Revolutionary period, many communard farmers in Graad reported extraordinary yields of certain root vegetables, most notably turnips.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "In fact, reports from the Revolutio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In fact, reports from the Revolutionary period claim that the most radically devoted communards were able to engage in vigorous sexual intercourse for up to *eight hours* at a time.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, you left me hanging there.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, you left me hanging there."

fields.Title: You: "Forget it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Forget it.

fields.Title: Logic: "In other words, there's no evidence..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In other words, there's no evidence that any of this mind-reading stuff is real.

fields.Title: IsTHCPresent("lawbringer")
IsTHCPresent("lawbringer")
!(IsTHCPresent("lawbringer"))
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Of course, it's impossible to say w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, it's impossible to say what exactly happens under these conditions. No known society has ever achieved the levels of revolutionary enthusiasm the theory seems to require.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You must! Everyone knows books save..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You must! Everyone knows books save their best parts for the end...

fields.Title: You: "Let's return to it later. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's return to it later. [Leave.]

fields.Title: simplified hub
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Whoa is right! What's more, Nilsen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoa is right! What's more, Nilsen speculated that this plasm, when it becomes powerful enough, might begin to *influence* the material reality surrounding it. Hence the name: *infra-materialism*.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "And on that note, you feel like you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And on that note, you feel like you've gotten the general idea of Infra-Materialism. Enough to carry on a basic conversation, at least. But if you'd like to go even deeper into some of the more speculative aspects of the theory, you could always read further...

Variable["reputation.kim"] < 1

You: ""You and me, we're on the same wave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You and me, we're on the same wavelength. It's why we're always finishing each other's..."

fields.Title: You: ""... sentences.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "... sentences."

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "According to infra-materialist theo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: According to infra-materialist theory, yes! Under suitably revolutionary conditions, that is...

fields.Title: Jump to: [mental projection]
Rhetoric: "This should be more than enough for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This should be more than enough for a stimulating discussion. That said, if you're still yearning for *more*....

fields.Title: above reality
You: "I've got to know what that's about."
fields.Dialogue Text: I've got to know what that's about.

fields.Title: You: "I've heard enough."
fields.Dialogue Text: I've heard enough.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "It's also been postulated that plas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's also been postulated that plasm may account for the remarkably full and manly facial hair observed on *some* communist males.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Of course, infra-materialists argue..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course, infra-materialists argue that revolutionary plasm may stimulate human physiology in other ways as well.

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.basic_guide_concept_strange_enough"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_concept_strange_enough"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_concept_strange_enough"])
You: ""It's way more than average. Haven'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's way more than average. Haven't you noticed that we're always finishing each other's..."

fields.Title: You: "Why didn't they just get some high-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why didn't they just get some high-powered merc gear? (Tap your armour.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckEquipped("gloves_t500")  or  CheckEquipped("shoes_t500")  or  CheckEquipped("shirt_t500")  or  CheckEquipped("hat_t500")

fields.Title: last hub
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "You spend a moment contemplating th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You spend a moment contemplating the cover's slightly unnerving swirl of orange, yellow, and green.

fields.Title: Jump to: [MAIN HUB]
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The cover of this pocket-sized volu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The cover of this pocket-sized volume features a swirl of orange, yellow, and green. The title, "A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism," is set in an authoritative yet approachable serif font.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Apricots."
fields.Dialogue Text: Apricots.

fields.Title: You: "So far, so good."
fields.Dialogue Text: So far, so good.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The book fits quite snugly into you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The book fits quite snugly into your palm. It would also fit comfortably into a jacket pocket.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "During his unparalleled life, he he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: During his unparalleled life, he helped guide a revolution in one country and found a new state in another. Along the way, he committed some of the most notorious war crimes in an era famed for its atrocities.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "If you're like most people, you pro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you're like most people, you probably believe that your thoughts reside in your brain, right?

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_thoughts"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_thoughts"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_inland_thoughts"])
You: "This... doesn't make any sense."
fields.Dialogue Text: This... doesn't make any sense.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Infra-materialists divide the extra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Infra-materialists divide the extra-physical effects of the revolutionary state by the level of plasm required to achieve them.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "No wonder the communards couldn't s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No wonder the communards couldn't shoot straight -- they were too shagged out!

fields.Title: You: "Wait, does that mean communists can..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, does that mean communists can *read minds*?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's true that you and I do share..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's true that you and I do share a similar addiction, but that's hardly remarkable among officers of the RCM."

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Because plasm has never been direct..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because plasm has never been directly observed, the exact mechanism behind these effects remains entirely speculative.

fields.Title: You: "Let it go."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it go.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Much of what we know of the communa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Much of what we know of the communards' activities during this period come from memoirs and second-hand accounts, some only written down decades after the fact and of dubious authenticity.

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.wrapper_inland_discard"]
Variable["inventory.wrapper_inland_discard"]
!(Variable["inventory.wrapper_inland_discard"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "On the inside jacket flap, you find..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On the inside jacket flap, you find a brief summary: "What is infra-materialism? A highly theoretical branch of Mazovian communism? A collection of mystical ramblings by a discredited revolutionary? Or possibly both?"

fields.Title: You: "Read the introduction on Ignus Nils..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Read the introduction on Ignus Nilsen.

fields.Title: Jump to: [MAIN HUB]
Interfacing: "Completely backwards. You think wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Completely backwards. You think with your hands, always have.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, so this isn't even *Nilsen's*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, so this isn't even *Nilsen's* theory -- it's his followers'?

fields.Title: Logic: "That's because this is absolute idi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's because this is absolute idiocy. Not even worth engaging with.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Stop, stop! Banish the thought. Thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stop, stop! Banish the thought. This isn't what you came for.

fields.Title: You: "So why do these effects only work f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So why do these effects only work for hyper-revolutionary communists? (Continue.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you evenly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at you evenly for a moment, then returns to his notebook without a word.

fields.Title: Variable["yard.hanged_left_kim_hanging"]
Variable["yard.hanged_left_kim_hanging"]
!(Variable["yard.hanged_left_kim_hanging"])
A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "When a society's revolutionary ferv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: When a society's revolutionary fervour reaches the third and highest level, infra-materialist theoreticians have postulated that the laws of physics cease to be laws.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Something about that tower looks aw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something about that tower looks awfully familiar. Could it be *that's* what the students were trying to recreate with the matchboxes?

fields.Title: You: "Plausible or not, there's something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Plausible or not, there's something beautiful about this idea. Is there any more?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "In the corner of one of the reprodu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the corner of one of the reproduced notebook pages, you can make out the following words written in Nilsen's distinctive slashing script...

fields.Title: You: "[Put the book away.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Put the book away.]

fields.Title: You: "Finish the book."
fields.Dialogue Text: Finish the book.

fields.Title: You: "I'm more of a tactile guy. I let my..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm more of a tactile guy. I let my fingers guide me.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "*Very* interesting. And not so far..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Very* interesting. And not so far removed from Ignus Nilsen's own theories...

fields.Title: You: "Hold on, can you put that in slight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hold on, can you put that in slightly *more* basic terms?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "You flip forward a few pages until..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You flip forward a few pages until you come upon a chapter titled 'Mental Projection and Transference'...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If by 'special' you mean 'marred b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If by 'special' you mean 'marred by extreme dysfunction,' then yes, I suppose it is pretty special."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Pssst! You know what *else* lets yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pssst! You know what *else* lets you feel like you can read minds? Spooky ol' pyrholidon...

fields.Title: Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_evidence"]
Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_evidence"]
!(Variable["inventory.basic_guide_logic_evidence"])
You: "Has anyone ever gotten close to rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Has anyone ever gotten close to reaching the third level?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "In the SRV, there have been attempt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the SRV, there have been attempts to organise certain species of aquatic mammals, as well as a few of the higher corvids...

fields.Title: Jump to: [A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The book fits quite snugly into you..."]
You: "Keep reading."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep reading.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "The actual theory is highly technic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The actual theory is highly technical, but for the purposes of this Brief Look(TM), that's a fine *working definition* of the concept.

fields.Title: You: "Huh. Okay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Huh. Okay...

fields.Title: Variable["character.habit_speed"]
Variable["character.habit_speed"]
!(Variable["character.habit_speed"])
logibhub
You: "Did it work?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Did it work?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "There's no evidence the communards..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no evidence the communards were equipped with finger pistols, though it's unlikely they would have decisively altered the outcome.

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "Precisely. Nilsen observed that the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Precisely. Nilsen observed that the financial system operates on the same principle of faith, so why not an architectural system?

fields.Title: A Brief Look at Infra-Materialism: "There is no more. You've reached th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no more. You've reached the outer theoretical limits of communism, and in less than 200 pages.
